author: nd
msg: - xalan 2.5.2 seems to have an encoding bug -> downgrade
- ant 1.6 start script + ant-launcher (a) slow down the process and
(b) seem to hide the xalan bug (ant 1.5.3 with xalan 2.5.2 throws
an exception, ant 1.6.0 puts question marks into the result code)
It should work again now. I'm trying to investigate further...
